transforms.code:
"""
	####THIS SECTION FOR INFORMATION ONLY####
	#Example Drug Screen Detail data object should look like this:
	{
		"value": {
		  "id": 0
		  "employee_id": 0
		  "employee_name": "John Q Smith"
		  "incident_date": 654789666,
		  "incident_name": "The Big Food Fight",
		  "incident_location": "Lunch Room",
		  "incident_location_description": "North Side",
		  "incident_description": "It was a big food fight started by Fat Freddy"
		  "physical_injury":True
		  "property_damage": True,
		  "bar_participant" : False,
		  "time_created":657488990
		  "participant_role_id":0
		  "participant_role":"Secondary"
		 	 }
		"style": {
		      "classes" = "Table/Cell_Dashboard"
			  }
		}
	####END INFORMATION####
		
	####BEGIN ACTUAL SCRIPT####
	"""
	import traceback
	try:
		#query variables
		project = "HMS"
		#table_data is the data object to return
		table_data = []
	
		#Iterate over the results of the query
		for row in range(value.getRowCount()):
			row_struct = {}
			row_data = {}
			style = {}
			staff_list = []	
			#Map query results into correct attributes
			row_data['id'] = value.getValueAt(row, "id")
			row_data['incident_date'] = system.date.toMillis(value.getValueAt(row, "incident_date"))
			row_data['incident_name'] = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_name")
			row_data['incident_location_id'] = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_location_id")
			row_data['incident_location_name'] = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_location_name")
			desc = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_description")
			if desc != None:
				if len(desc) > 70:
					row_data['incident_description_trunc'] = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_description")[0:70]
				else:
					row_data['incident_description_trunc'] = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_description")
			else:
				row_data['incident_description_trunc'] = ''
			row_data['incident_description'] = value.getValueAt(row, "incident_description")
			row_data['physical_injury'] = value.getValueAt(row, "physical_injury")
			row_data['property_damage'] = value.getValueAt(row, "property_damage")
			row_data['bar_participant'] = value.getValueAt(row, "bar_participant")
			row_data['participant_human_id'] = value.getValueAt(row, "participant_human_id")
			#Set the default style for the row
			style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Dashboard"
			row_struct['value'] = row_data
			row_struct['style'] = style
			#Append the individual row date to the table data object
			table_data.append(row_struct)
		return table_data
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants IncidentTableDetail view.custom.incident_data")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

import traceback
	try:
		incident_data = value
		project = "HMS"
		#table_data is the data object to return
		suspension_data = []
				
		if len(incident_data) > 0:
			for row in range(len(incident_data)):
				try:
					incident_log_id =  int(self.custom.incident_data[row].value.id)
					bar_participant = self.custom.incident_data[row].value.bar_participant
					#system.perspective.print(incident_log_id)
					#system.perspective.print(bar_participant)
					#Format the query data
					row_struct = {}
					row_data = {}
					style = {}	
					#Only query if it is expected to return a result
					#if bar_participant:
					if bar_participant:
						path = "Participants/Incidents/SuspensionDetailSelect"
						parameters = {"incident_log_id":incident_log_id}
						suspension = system.db.runNamedQuery(project=project,path=path,parameters=parameters, getKey=True)
					else:
						header = ['empty_dataset']
						rows = []
						suspension = system.dataset.toDataSet(header, rows)
					if suspension.getRowCount():
						#Map query results into correct attributes
						row_data['suspension_id'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_id")
						row_data['suspension_type_id'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_type_id")
						row_data['suspension_type_name'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_type_name")
						row_data['suspension_notes'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_notes")
						row_data['suspension_notes_trunc'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_notes")[0:80]
						row_data['suspension_duration'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_duration")
						row_data['suspension_time_begin'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_time_begin")
						row_data['suspension_time_end'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "suspension_time_end")
						row_data['reinstateRequired'] = suspension.getValueAt(0, "reinstateRequired")
						row_data['reinstated'] = suspension.getValueAt(0,"reinstated")
					#Insert empty data to hold the place in the row if no suspension
					else:
						row_data['suspension_id'] = -1
						row_data['suspension_type_id'] = -1
						row_data['suspension_type_name'] = ''
						row_data['suspension_notes'] = ''
						row_data['suspension_notes_trunc'] = ''
						row_data['suspension_duration'] = 0
						row_data['suspension_time_begin'] = ''
						row_data['suspension_time_end'] = ''
						row_data['reinstateRequired'] = -1
						row_data['reinstated'] =  -1
					#Set the default style for the row
					style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Detail"
					row_struct['value'] = row_data
					row_struct['style'] = style
					#Append the individual row date to the table data object
					suspension_data.append(row_struct)
				except:
					pass			
			return suspension_data
	
		else:
			return suspension_data
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants IncidentTableDetail view.custom.suspension_data")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

onChange.script:
#Refresh the table data any time the suspension data has changed
	self.refreshBinding("custom.table_data")

transforms.code:
import traceback
	try:
		incident_data = value
		suspension_data = self.custom.suspension_data
		if suspension_data is None:
			suspension_data = []
		elif len(suspension_data) < 1:
			suspension_data = []
		table_data = []
		#Move the date from the incidents directly to the table
		#system.perspective.print('# of Incidents:' + str(len(incident_data)))
		#system.perspective.print('# of Suspensions:' + str(len(suspension_data)))
		if len(incident_data) > 0 and len(incident_data)==len(suspension_data):
			for row in range(len(incident_data)):
				row_struct = {}
				row_data = {}
				style = {}	
				#Map query results into correct attributes
				row_data['id'] = incident_data[row].value.id
				row_data['incident_date'] = incident_data[row].value.incident_date
				row_data['incident_name'] = incident_data[row].value.incident_name
				row_data['incident_location_id'] = incident_data[row].value.incident_location_id
				row_data['incident_location_name'] = incident_data[row].value.incident_location_name
				row_data['incident_description_trunc'] = incident_data[row].value.incident_description_trunc
				row_data['incident_description'] = incident_data[row].value.incident_description
				row_data['physical_injury'] = incident_data[row].value.physical_injury
				row_data['property_damage'] = incident_data[row].value.property_damage
				row_data['bar_participant'] = incident_data[row].value.bar_participant
				row_data['participant_human_id'] = incident_data[row].value.participant_human_id
				row_data['suspension_id'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_id
				row_data['suspension_type_id'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_type_id
				row_data['suspension_type_name'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_type_name
				row_data['suspension_notes'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_notes
				row_data['suspension_notes_trunc'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_notes_trunc
				row_data['suspension_duration'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_duration
				row_data['suspension_time_begin'] = suspension_data[row].value.suspension_time_begin
				row_data['suspension_time_end'] =  suspension_data[row].value.suspension_time_end
				row_data['reinstateRequired'] =  suspension_data[row].value.reinstateRequired
				row_data['reinstated'] =  suspension_data[row].value.reinstated
				#Set the default style for the row
				#style['classes'] = "Table/Cell_Detail"
				#note['services'] = service_list
				#row_struct['value'] = row_data
				#row_struct['style'] = style
				#Append the individual row date to the table data object
				#table_data.append(row_struct)
				table_data.append(row_data)
		
		return table_data
	except:
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participants IncidentTableDetail view.custom.table_data")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

onChange.script:
#Send the message to refresh the table
	system.perspective.sendMessage(messageType="refreshIncidentDetail", payload={}, scope="session")

transforms.code: return "#FFFFFF00" if value is None or value == -1 else "#9AF4EB4D"

messageHandlers.script:
### Refresh data
	system.perspective.print("Refresh Incident Detail")
	self.refreshBinding("props.data")
	self.props.selection.selectedRow = -1

# implement your handler here
	import traceback
	try:
		#Generate the report
		project = "HMS"
		path = "Participant/Participant_Incidents"
		parameters = {'ParticipantId':self.view.params.participantID}
#		system.perspective.print(parameters)
		pdfFile = system.report.executeReport(path,project,parameters,fileType='pdf')
		filename = 'Participant_Incidents_' + str(system.date.format(system.date.now(),"yyyyMMddHHmmss")) + '.pdf'

		system.perspective.download(filename, pdfFile)
	except:   
		logger = system.util.getLogger("Participant Incidents tableToPDF")
		msg = traceback.format_exc()
		logger.error(msg)

### Refresh data
	system.perspective.print("Refresh Incident Data")
	view = self.view
	view.refreshBinding("custom.incident_data")
	view.refreshBinding("custom.suspension_data")
